channel.title: Recommenders on See Hiong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Recommenders on See Hiong's Blog

item.title: Building a Recommender System
item.description: In this post, we walk through the process of building a movie recommender system using deep learning embeddings and PostgreSQL with pgvector. You’ll learn how to extract and normalize item features, generate vector embeddings with TensorFlow, store them in a Postgres database, and perform similarity searches to recommend relevant content. The system leverages cosine distance for finding similar items and user preferences, enabling efficient, scalable recommendations.
